## Practice Assignment 3

The files for the practice assignment should be contained within this repository. This includes a python script to create the database asked, and the practice quit questions solved in R an Python for the database in the Practice Assignment.

The data used was accessed through the Harvard Dataverse (https://dataverse.harvard.edu/). The data specifically is from the Data Expo 2009, regarding various airline and flight data.
